analytic.title: Ps 119 and 139–147 in East-Syrian Commentaries: The Interdependence of the Commentaries of Theodore of Mopsuestia, Īšō‘dād of Merw and Denḥā (ms. Mingana 58): First Soundings

monogr.title: Philologisches und Historisches zwischen Anatolien und Sokotra: Analecta Semitica In Memoriam Alexander Sima

body.bibl: Leonhard, Clemens. “Ps 119 and 139–147 in East-Syrian Commentaries: The Interdependence of the Commentaries of Theodore of Mopsuestia, Īšō‘dād of Merw and Denḥā (Ms. Mingana 58): First Soundings.” In Philologisches Und Historisches Zwischen Anatolien Und Sokotra: Analecta Semitica In Memoriam Alexander Sima, edited by Werner Arnold, Michael Jursa, Walter W. Müller, and Stephan Procházka, 181–206. Wiesbaden: Harrassowitz Verlag, 2009.

Clemens Leonhard, Ps 119 and 139–147 in East-Syrian Commentaries: The Interdependence of the Commentaries of Theodore of Mopsuestia, Īšō‘dād of Merw and Denḥā (Ms. Mingana 58): First Soundings, in Philologisches Und Historisches Zwischen Anatolien Und Sokotra: Analecta Semitica In Memoriam Alexander Sima, ed.
